New Records: Yuzvendra Chahal went past Jasprit Bumrah to become India's leading wicket-taker in T20Is
Rohit Sharma overtakes Martin Guptill as the leading run-scorer in T20Is
Key Match Events: India beat Sri Lanka by 62 runs in the first T20I at the Ekana Sports City in Lucknow
Shreyas Iyer scored an unbeaten 57 off just 28 balls
Ishan and Rohit Sharma added 111 runs for the opening wicket
Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Venkatesh Iyer took two wickets each
Yuzvendra Chahal and Ravindra Jadeja took one wicket each
Bhuvneshwar Kumar broke Sri Lanka's back with early wickets
Bhuvneshwar Kumar dismissed Pathum Nissanka on the first ball
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bowl
India made 6 changes from the side that beat West Indies in the third ODI
Ruturaj Gaikwad missed out due to wrist injury
Ravindra Jadeja and Jasprit Bumrah returned to the team
India were without former captain Virat Kohli and wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant, who were rested ahead of the two-match Test series next month
